summary: The module defines an evaluator that processes a structured dataframe containing teacher and student sentence embeddings for multiple language pairs, computes the mean squared error (scaled by 100) between them, and reports this metric as a measure of model quality within the Sentenceâ€‘Transformers evaluation framework.
business_intent: Enable systematic comparison and validation of multilingual sentence embedding models by quantifying how closely a student model reproduces reference (teacher) embeddings, supporting model development, selection, and benchmarking workflows.
